Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux Vulnerabilities
text: CVE-2022-28190; CVSS:5.5 NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper input validation in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape. By sending a specially-crafted request, a local authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.
